text: Dom on the Spot is a British factual documentary series hosted by Dom Littlewood produced by Twofour for BBC One about fixed penalty notices, also known as on the spot fines. The series began on 5 September 2016, and a second series aired in 2017.http://www.tenby-today.co.uk/article.cfm?id=110423 ==Episodes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 British television series debuts Category:2010s British documentary television series Category:BBC high definition shows Category:BBC television documentaries Category:English-language television shows
title: Dom on the Spot
